    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractJiraClient

        public AbstractJiraClient(AbstractJiraClient.ExternalAttachmentHandler externalAttachmentHandler)
        Service class that allows to get independent input stream to attachment. This class provides access to attachment by basic HTTP auth. or via SSL-connection with prepared SSLContext. If uses HTTPS it is necessary to setup SSL context.
